/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV035QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT * FROM( SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '0' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) || '년 합계' ELSE SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) || '년' || SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) || '월말 합계' END AS STTC_TIT1 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) || '년 합계' ELSE SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) || '년' || SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) || '월말 합계' END AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '1' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '감사교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '감사원직원' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '2' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '감사교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '자체감사 담당자' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '3' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '감사교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '소계' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '4' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '회계교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '회계업무 담당자' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '5' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '기타교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '기타과정' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '6' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '기타교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '사이버연수과정' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4) AS AUD_YR , '7' AS ROW_KND_CD , 'Y' AS VIEW_YN , 'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN , '기타교육' AS STTC_TIT1 , '소계' AS STTC_TIT2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL4 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL5 , TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL6 FROM DUAL ) T1 UNION All SELECT T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '01' AND T2.AUD_YR = (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T2.AUD_YR)-1) FROM TWFAACAV200D T2 WHERE T2.STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR = T2.AUD_YR AND T1.STTC_END_MON <> '12' THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 2 = T2.AUD_YR AND T1.STTC_END_MON = '12' THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT2 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,T2.STTC_COL6 FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR BETWEEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -25),0,4) AND SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt},-13),0,4) ORDER BY AUD_YR DESC , ROW_KND_CD

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV035QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT2 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,T2.STTC_COL6 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR = T2.AUD_YR AND T1.STTC_END_MON <> '12' THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 2 = T2.AUD_YR AND T1.STTC_END_MON = '12' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV035QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'035' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV035QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_TIT2 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,STTC_COL5 ,STTC_COL6 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'035' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '035' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcTit2} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{sttcCol4} ,#{sttcCol5} ,#{sttcCol6} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
